inputs.selection_motivation: The link to the specific September 2025 Fed rate cut is a one‑off event with limited ongoing relevance and weak cross‑asset reach compared to canonical handles, making it the weakest link.

prioritized_link.motivation: WTI price movements shape long‑term inflation expectations and risk‑premium dynamics, key drivers of the 30‑year Treasury yield; linking them captures the full term‑structure impact of oil shocks.

source_node.query: (WTI OR WTI_crude OR WTI_crude_oil OR WTI_oil OR WTI) OR (crude oil OR oil OR petroleum) OR (CL OR CL=) OR (Brent OR Brent_crude OR Brent_oil) OR (OPEC OR OPEC+) OR (US crude inventory OR US crude stock OR US crude inventory data OR US crude inventory report) OR (oil supply OR oil demand OR crude supply OR crude demand OR oil production OR crude production OR oil consumption OR crude consumption OR oil rigs OR rig count OR rig drilling) OR (oil price OR oil prices OR oil price movement OR oil price forecast OR oil price outlook OR oil price trend OR oil price volatility OR oil price analysis OR oil price news OR oil price update OR oil price report OR oil price data OR oil price chart OR oil price graph) OR (news OR analysis OR report OR update OR trend OR market OR price OR movement OR volatility OR forecast OR outlook OR data OR chart OR graph)
source_node.name: WTI Crude Oil
